At this point, you already know of the benefits of a healthy meal plan. Apart from the general idea of getting what your system needs to stay healthy, it is essential to stay away from foods that may contain harmful pathogens. In addition to the known harmful bacteria that one should avoid, specific ingredients like caffeine are to remain limited. 

So, avoid not only well-known poisons such as alcohol, caffeine, nicotine but also unpasteurized dairy, raw or seared seafood, rare or underdone meat, hot dogs, fresh eggs, high-mercury fish, raw sprouts. It is also wise to stay away from any dairy product that contains unpasteurized ingredients. To be sure, always check the label.
